attributes.title: Burnie Vlog #1
attributes.caption: To celebrate the Year of the Rooster, Burnie will be releasing new behind-the-scenes vlogs for RT Life. Ever wondered what a workday looks like at Rooster Teeth? Join Burnie for a peek into a typical Monday.
attributes.description: To celebrate the Year of the Rooster, Burnie will be releasing new behind-the-scenes vlogs for RT Life. Ever wondered what a workday looks like at Rooster Teeth? Join Burnie for a peek into a typical Monday.Listen on ITunes and Spotify!

attributes.title: Burnie Vlog #2
attributes.caption: Burnie smashes a phone, completes the jigsaw puzzle of packing his suitcases, and arrives in Australia for RTX Sydney.
attributes.description: Burnie smashes a phone, completes the jigsaw puzzle of packing his suitcases, and arrives in Australia for RTX Sydney.

attributes.title: RTX Sydney
attributes.caption: Burnie documents the fun and mayhem of RTX Sydney, from live action production shoots to panel after panel.
attributes.description: Burnie documents the fun and mayhem of RTX Sydney, from live action production shoots to panel after panel.

attributes.title: New Zealand
attributes.caption: Burnie and Ashley encounter all number of travel problems, hang out with Hideo Kojima, explore a spooky former nunnery, and enjoy some truly stunning scenery.
attributes.description: Burnie and Ashley encounter all number of travel problems, hang out with Hideo Kojima, explore a spooky former nunnery, and enjoy some truly stunning scenery.

attributes.title: Broken Nintendo Switch
attributes.caption: Ashley made the mistake of asking Burnie to help unbox her new Nintendo Switch, but Burnie redeems himself by showing us around Austin, including a sneak peek at the newest Alamo Drafthouse right by the Rooster Teeth office.
attributes.description: Ashley made the mistake of asking Burnie to help unbox her new Nintendo Switch, but Burnie redeems himself by showing us around Austin, including a sneak peek at the newest Alamo Drafthouse right by the Rooster Teeth office.

attributes.title: Grocery Store
attributes.caption: Burnie muses about the past, present, and future while touring the lanes of a local grocery store during filming for Million Dollars But. Also Gavin wears a suit of armor.
attributes.description: Burnie muses about the past, present, and future while touring the lanes of a local grocery store during filming for Million Dollars But. Also Gavin wears a suit of armor.

attributes.title: Cartoon Tesla
attributes.caption: Burnie transforms his Tesla through the magic of cel shading into an incredible vehicle reminiscent of something out of a cartoon or video game.
attributes.description: Burnie transforms his Tesla through the magic of cel shading into an incredible vehicle reminiscent of something out of a cartoon or video game.

attributes.title: Los Angeles
attributes.caption: Burnie bumps into Zach Anner on the streets of Austin while attending SXSW, then takes a trip to LA to visit Funhaus.
attributes.description: Burnie bumps into Zach Anner on the streets of Austin while attending SXSW, then takes a trip to LA to visit Funhaus.

attributes.title: At the Special Olympics
attributes.caption: Burnie and Gavin travel to Austria for the Special Olympics Winter Games. From riding gondolas to absurd heights to testing their marksmanship, their time at the games culminates in an amazing opening ceremony.
attributes.description: Burnie and Gavin travel to Austria for the Special Olympics Winter Games. From riding gondolas to absurd heights to testing their marksmanship, their time at the games culminates in an amazing opening ceremony.

attributes.title: Q&A
attributes.caption: Burnie takes a moment from filming LT2 to answer some questions from the RT community.
attributes.description: Burnie takes a moment from filming LT2 to answer some questions from the RT community.

attributes.title: Lockhart BBQ Tour
attributes.caption: On a day off from shooting Lazer Team 2, Burnie takes the cast on a tour of Lockhart's famous BBQ spots
attributes.description: On a day off from shooting Lazer Team 2, Burnie takes the cast on a tour of Lockhart's famous BBQ spots

attributes.title: A Day On A Film Set
attributes.caption: Burnie takes us behind the scenes of a movie production, and shows us a what a typical day on a film set looks like, and how many people it takes to make a movie!
attributes.description: Burnie takes us behind the scenes of a movie production, and shows us a what a typical day on a film set looks like, and how many people it takes to make a movie!
attributes.display_title: A Day On A Film Set

attributes.title: Gavin's British Cowboy Makeover
attributes.caption: Burnie takes Gavin to buy a cowboy hat and boots to celebrate his fifth year of living in Texas...but, of course, Gavin gets a little carried away!
attributes.description: Burnie takes Gavin to buy a cowboy hat and boots to celebrate his fifth year of living in Texas...but, of course, Gavin gets a little carried away!

attributes.title: How Does Rooster Teeth Make Money?
attributes.caption: Burnie takes us through Rooster Teeth's business model, and explains why Rooster Teeth aren't scared of the "YouTube Ad Apocalypse".
attributes.description: Rooster Teeth Execs, Burnie, Matt and Ezra, explain the business' 5 part model: ad revenue, subscriptions, licensed content, events and merchandise.
attributes.display_title: How Does Rooster Teeth Make Money?

attributes.title: San Francisco "High-End" Weed Dinner
attributes.caption: Burnie is invited to a "Cannabis Industry" dinner, north of San Francisco, by a fellow competitor from The Amazing Race and Cannabis entrepreneur, Jessica VerSteeg.
attributes.description: Since the legalization of Marijuana in California a culture of 'haute' Cannabis has begun to emerge. When invited to a Cannabis infused private dinner in San Francisco, Burnie decides to make a weekend of it to celebrate Ashley's birthday! Music: "Jamming with Jay" MellowStu / "Jazz Man" MellowStu / "Mowtown Funk and Soul Bliss Bed Mix" Chezgroove

attributes.title: New Assistant and a Cheese Dinner
attributes.caption: Burnie heads to New York for the Youtube Creators Summit, but not before deciding to upgrade Ellie's office.
attributes.description: With "outdoorsy" as his only instruction, Burnie designs a wooden desk for his assistant, Ellie. After Travis builds and installs his creation, Ellie and Max take it to the left level. Meanwhile in NY, Burnie, Gavin and Dan celebrate Slow Mo Guys.
attributes.display_title: New Assistant and a Cheese Dinner

attributes.title: How I Stay Motivated
attributes.caption: Burnie moves to LA to refocus, and to stay motivated in his creative endeavours.
attributes.description: Burnie moves to LA to refocus, and to stay motivated in his creative endeavours.

attributes.title: The Last Ringling Circus
attributes.caption: Burnie meets up with Olga Kay, former YouTube star turned entrepreneur, to go to the last ever Ringling Bros Circus Show in New York.
attributes.description: Olga left her small Russian village at the age of 14 to join the travelling circus, and at 16 was brought to America to perform in the Ringling Circus' Greatest Show On Earth! Burnie and Olga go to the last show, and she gives us a snapshot of life in rural Russia, moving to America and becoming a "YouTuber".

attributes.title: Failure
attributes.caption: Burnie walks and talks us through his week in Austin and LA, and discusses the subject of "Failure"
attributes.description: Burnie walks and talks us through his week in Austin and LA, and discusses the subject of "Failure"

attributes.title: Battlegrounds Win and Company All Hands
attributes.caption: Burnie wins Battlegrounds (and is pretty pleased about it) and takes us behind the scenes to the mid-year Rooster Teeth "All Hands" meeting. There are so many hands...
attributes.description: Burnie wins Battlegrounds (and is pretty pleased about it) and takes us behind the scenes to the mid-year Rooster Teeth "All Hands" meeting. There are so many hands...
attributes.display_title: Battlegrounds Win and Company All Hands

attributes.title: Battlefront II vs AH and The New Xbox at E3
attributes.caption: ​Burnie travels to E3 and gets his colleagues reactions to the possible new Xbox name, and tests out the new Battlefront game.
attributes.description: Burnie travels to E3 and gets his colleagues reactions to the possible new Xbox name, and tests out the new Battlefront game. For a brief and glorious moment, he actually held the top spot. Thanks to EA for sponsoring this video!
attributes.display_title: Battlefront II vs AH and The New Xbox at E3

attributes.title: RTX Austin Food Tour
attributes.caption: Burnie and the crew take you through all your Austin food staples in a day.
attributes.description: Whenever RTX rolls into town, Burnie always gets asked for his food recommendations, so Burnie, Ashley, Jon, Barbara, Ellie and Naomi decide to visit all 8 of their recommendations in one day...! Did they do permanent damage? Does Jon fly too close to the sun? Find out!

attributes.title: RTX Austin
attributes.caption: A behind the scenes look at Burnie's RTX
attributes.description: RTX Austin, Rooster Teeth's own gaming and internet culture convention, just took place. Burnie gives us a behind the scenes snapshot of his RTX: panels, signings, the convention floor, and the secret back hallways.

attributes.title: How to Get a Job at Rooster Teeth... (or any creative company)
attributes.caption: How many of the well known faces at Rooster Teeth got their start in the entertainment industry
attributes.description: Burnie interviews employees of Rooster Teeth and asks them all two questions: "What was your first job?" and "What was your big break in the entertainment industry?". The answers build a solid list of advice for anyone persuing a career in this field: make yourself available for opportunities, volunteer, intern and work unpaid, develop many different skills, get out of your comfort zone, build a brand for yourself and MAKE CONTENT!
attributes.display_title: How to Get a Job at Rooster Teeth... (or any creative company)

attributes.title: Say Yes to Everything
attributes.caption: Burnie's buddy Drew Baldwin comes to town, and within 24 hours has organized a friday night yacht race...of course.
attributes.description: Burnie takes us on a very Austin style yacht race on Lake Travis and explores what it means to be a social chameleon. Ellie is definitely the best sailor on board and in no way embarrases her family or nation...

attributes.title: Battlegrounds and Cheddar Biscuits
attributes.caption: While Burnie gears up for a Battlegrounds Tournament, he sets Ellie a task for Michael's birthday
attributes.description: Burnie and his PUBG crew take on the cunning AH in a battllegrounds...battle. He also woefully underestimates the resourcefulness of his producer and assistant, setting a task with the intention of bamboozling her, which she CONQUERS with panache. She definitely doesn't write these descriptions...

attributes.title: Ellie is Trying to Kill Me?
attributes.caption: Burnie takes a trip to LA to appear on "My Drunk Kitchen" and catches the last @Midnight taping.
attributes.description: Ellie books Burnie a boutique hipster LA hotel, to his DISMAY (although it was actually pretty cool); Burnie takes on the ultimate Dad task and fixes up Hannah Hart's studio after appearing on her show, AND catches the last ever @Midnight taping.
attributes.display_title: Ellie is Trying to Kill Me?

attributes.title: Performance Review
attributes.caption: Burnie gives Ellie her quarterly Performance Review
attributes.description: After a full quarter working together, Burnie evaluates Ellie's performance, and introduces the need for her to develop a very particular set of skills to continue as his assistant; namely, prepping for the apocalypse. It turns out that at present, she is woefully unprepared...

attributes.title: Making a Sword
attributes.caption: Burnie and Ellie learn how to cast a bronze age sword
attributes.description: The first step of Ellie's "Skill Tree" is weapons, but before she can move onto smithing she learns how to cast a bronze sword. Burnie...supervises. Additional Camera: Zach RothEditor: Chelsea Harfoush

attributes.title: New York Dojo
attributes.caption: Burnie sends Ellie off to find a martial arts dojo while he and Sophie are in NY on a Rooster Teeth press tour
attributes.description: Sophie takes Burnie to New York to promote Rooster Teeth's latest projects and productions...meanwhile Ellie heads into downtown New York City to begin her journey from zero to hero.

attributes.title: Machine Gun Helicopter
attributes.caption: Continuing the Skill Tree training, out in Las Vegas
attributes.description: Burnie is sent to Las Vegas to speak at the Game Stop conference. Whilst there, he organizes a part of Ellie's "Skill Tree" training...shooting a machine gun out of a helicopter.

attributes.title: Harvey Donation Boxes
attributes.caption: How to pack a disaster relief donation box
attributes.description: Burnie and Ellie decide to see how long it takes to put together a "Welcome Kit" for those displaced from their homes by Hurricane Harvey. Music: Go To Sleep, Limitless - Matt Cherne, Happy Ending 10 - Jonatan Järpehag. Story and Post Producer: Chelsea Harfoush.

attributes.title: Ellie Learns Krav Maga
attributes.caption: Burnie's assistant studies Krav Maga in order to protect her boss in the event of an apocalypse.
attributes.description:
Burnie wants his assistant to be prepared to protect him from any danger, so Ellie turns to The Know's Eddy Rivas - who happens to be a certified Krav Maga instructor. Miles...helps. MusicGo To Sleep 6. British Invasion 6 - Bjorn SkogsbergMe and My Dirt 3 - Niklas Gustavsson

http://lionskravmaga.comStory & post-producer - Chelsea Harfoush

attributes.title: Sniper School
attributes.caption: Burnie surprises Ellie with a weekend Sniper class in the Texas Hill Country.
attributes.description:
Burnie sends Ellie off to Barksdale, TX for long range weapons traning. A British fish out of water, Ellie acompanies the FTW Ranch team on a net gunning mission, a super long range attempt and a tannerite explosion, whilst undergoing a two day training course that ends in a "not competition"....but did she win? 





Music: "Down And Dirty" John August Pregler, "Get Dirty Again" John August Pregler, Bernard James II Perry, "Country Strut" David John Vanacore, Matt Koskenmaki, "Hogs in the Mud A" Michael Alan Raphael, "Boondock Rock" David John Vanacore, Matt Koskenmaki, "Kneeds in the Dirt" Nikky French, "Big Swamp" Christopher James Goulstone, Keith Peter Christmas. Story and Post Producer: Chelsea Harfoush. Special thanks to Tim Fallon, Dave Knesek and all the folks at FTW Ranch! ftwsaam.com/

attributes.title: Streamys, Edgewalk, and Barenaked Ladies
attributes.caption: Burnie's travels take him to LA, the set of a music video, and the top of Toronto.
attributes.description: Burnie and Ashley head to Los Angeles to host the first ever Purpose Awards as well as support the Rooster Teeth family at the Streamys. Then it's away to Toronto, where Burnie and Ellie help out on the set of the Barenaked Ladies' latest music video. Finally, Burnie surprises Ellie with a trip to the CN Tower's Edgewalk to continue her apocalypse training.

attributes.title: Making a Sword Belt
attributes.caption: Ellie needs armor for the apocalypse, so she turns to leatherworker Drew Saplin to make a sword belt.
attributes.description: After Burnie instructed Ellie to prepare for a potential apocalypse by constructing her own sword, she turned to Rooster Teeth AD and part-time leather worker Drew Saplin to teach her how to construct a functional dual wielding sword belt.  Click here to watch Ellie and Burnie make a sword.  MUSIC Go to Sleep 6  Story and post-producer: Chelsea Harfoush

attributes.title: Burnie's New Bus
attributes.caption: The crew checks out Burnie's latest project for Marcus: a school bus converted into an RV to serve as a mobile office.
attributes.description:
Burnie, Ellie, Marcus, and Chelsea check out Burns’ latest purchase: a school bus conversion for work and travel. Burnie’s relying on Marcus to transform the RV into a functional office space, but while he and Ellie are away, Max comes to play…





MUSICGo to Sleep 6Tales (instrumental) - RaminBig Boys - Jan ChmelarMoneyMoneyMoney - Daniel Gunnarsson







Story and post-producer: Chelsea Harfoush

attributes.title: RTX London
attributes.caption: Burnie relates his experiences putting on the first-ever RTX London
attributes.description:
Burnie travels to London with several RT staff to put on the first ever RTX London. He talks about the crew’s experiences overseas and what it’s like holding a convention for the first time in a new city.

MUSICGo to Sleep 6





Story and post-producer: Chelsea Harfoush

attributes.title: Foraging in Kent
attributes.caption: Ellie and her sister Caroline are sent on a secret mission by Burnie to practice foraging and herbalism.
attributes.description:
Back home in England, Ellie receives a mysterious directive from from a traveling Burnie. Along with her sister Caroline, Ellie discovers she is meant to learn which plants can heal - and which can KILL - when you’re living off the land post-apocalypse.

MUSICGo to Sleep 6Sunny Side UpThe Old Lighthouse







Story & post-producer: Chelsea Harfoush

attributes.title: PAX Australia
attributes.caption: Burnie and Ellie travel to Melbourne to participate in PAX Australia
attributes.description:
Burnie, Ashley, and Ellie travel to Melbourne to take in the sights, sample fine millennial whiskey, and - most importantly - attend PAX Australia, where Burnie is giving the keynote. Afterwards, Ellie and Ashley have a surprise in store for Mr. Burns...

MUSIC
Dreamers - Matt Cherne
Kickin It - Matt Cherne
Limitless - Matt Cherne 
Funkadelic - Matt Cherne







Story and post-producer: Chelsea Harfoush

attributes.title: Scuba Diving at the Great Barrier Reef
attributes.caption: Ellie takes Burnie and Ashley to learn scuba diving at the Great Barrier Reef
attributes.description: Ellie flips the script on Burnie and gets him out of his comfort zone. After Pax Australia she takes Burnie and Ashley scuba diving, staying on a liveaboard boat at the Great Barrier Reef.  MUSIC: Go To Sleep, Bustra - Everything's Different (Monstercat Release), Da Tooby - Knockout 2, Liquid Lounge, Anders Morlin - Money Job, Pacific Palisades, Matt Cherne - Close.
attributes.display_title: Scuba Diving at the Great Barrier Reef

attributes.title: Saying No & Extra Life Behind the Scenes
attributes.caption: In a reversal of his previous vlog on saying yes, Burnie talks to friends and colleagues about the art of saying no.
attributes.description:
During the week leading up to Rooster Teeth’s annual Extra Life event, Burnie talks to different people around the office about the art of saying no and how it has the power to set you free and help you achieve your goals.

MUSIC
Go to Sleep 6
We Are Stardust (instrumental) - Bjorkman Pupavac
One More - Andre Aguado

Story & Post-producer - Chelsea Harfoush
attributes.display_title: Saying No & Extra Life Behind the Scenes

attributes.title: Quests at the Renaissance Faire
attributes.caption: Burnie and friends travel to the Texas Renaissance Festival to seek out fame, fortune, and turkey legs.
attributes.description:
King Burnie and Queen Ashley gather together a fellowship of Barbara, Ellie, Chelsea, Adam, Grace (Zonbi) and Ragnar the Dancing Bard (okay it was Patrick ssshhh) to travel to the Texas Renaissance Festival for a day of mead, fine foods, feats of strength, and showmanship. Each member of the fellowship has a specific quest they must complete. Who will succeed? Who will fail? Why is Burnie’s crown so tall? Why am I still typing questions?

MUSIC
Go to Sleep 6
Scandinavian Folk 11 (Ellie’s remix) - Stefan Netsman
Scandinavian Folk 28 -  Stefan Netsman
Scandinavian Folk 11 - Stefan Netsman
Scandinavian Folk 8 - Stefan Netsman
The Old Lighthouse - Various

attributes.title: Taking Risks
attributes.caption: Burnie sits down to chat about the importance of taking risks in your work.
attributes.description:
This week it’s back to the bus for another chat with Burnie! He’s here to talk about the importance of taking risks in your creative life, and how that’s shaped his journey to where he is today!

MUSIC
Go to Sleep 6


Story & Post-producer: Chelsea Harfoush

attributes.title: Getting Fit for the Apocalypse
attributes.caption: Ellie travels to Onnit Academy to begin her physical training to survive the apocalypse and protect Burnie.
attributes.description: Ellie travels to Onnit Academy to begin her physical training to survive the apocalypse and protect Burnie.

attributes.title: Inspiration
attributes.caption: Burnie talks Star Wars, inspiration, and how to stay creative.
attributes.description:
Just in time for the holidays, your favorite Burnie sits down to talk creative expression, finding inspiration, and the latest Star Wars movie.

MUSIC
Go to Sleep 6

Story & Post-producer: Chelsea Harfoush

attributes.title: Year of the Rooster
attributes.caption: Take a look back at all of Burnie's adventures during 2017!
attributes.description:
Just in time for the holidays, join Burnie and many familiar Rooster Teeth faces as we celebrate the Year of the Rooster and all the grand adventures it gave to us! From scuba diving the Great Barrier Reef to filming Lazer Team 2 and everything in between, 2017 packed a lot of punch. Enjoy!

MUSIC
Go to Sleep 6
Hyperarchive 2 - Anders Bother
Tough Act to Follow - Johannes Hager
British Invasion 6 - Bjorn Skogsberg
All You Need - Johan Svensson

Story & post-producer: Chelsea Harfoush

attributes.title: Ellie Gets Fired
attributes.caption: Burnie has decided that Ellie is too dangerous to continute on as his assistant.
attributes.description: Ellie is too dangerous to be Burnie's assistant. The solution? She will continue her training to become Bear Grylls / Lara Croft and Burnie will hire a jaguar (or a very smart Puma) for protection and to organize his calendar. Sounds about right. MUSIC: Dreamers by Matt Cherne

attributes.title: Resolutions
attributes.caption: Burnie asks RT what their New Years resolutions are, and what they are most excited for in 2018.
attributes.description: Your favorite friends at RT preview some exciting projects in the work for 2018, and talk about their personal goals for the year.

attributes.title: AMA
attributes.caption: Burnie answers the weird and wonderful questions from the community.
attributes.description: Ever wondered what Burnie's favorite moment in the history of RT is? Or what he would change? Or where he gets his clothes? Burnie answers questions sent in from the audience in the penultimate Vlog with help from Chelsea, and Gus (the dog).

attributes.title: The Final Vlog
attributes.caption: The Final Vlog.
attributes.description: Recorded January 12, 2018. The Vlog series ran from January 25th, 2017 to Janurary 23rd, 2018. Many people made it possible:  Ellie Main, Camino 84, Lumix, Bradley Friesen, Monstercat, Guy Blomberg, Matt Cherne, Brian Behm, Marcus LaPorte, Gavin Free, Matt Hullum, Jessica Versteeg, Olga Kay, Korey Kuhl, Hannah Hart, Chelsea Harfoush, Zach Roth, Onnit, Martha Marin, SAAM Hunter Training, Graphics Guys, Genesis Flight Academy, Barenaked Ladies, Cairns Dive Centre, DJI Global, Jordan Burns, JD Burns, Teddy Burns and Ashley Jenkins.
